opennlp.ccg.grammar
Class AbstractRule

java.lang.Object
  opennlp.ccg.grammar.AbstractRule
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Rule
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractApplicationRule, AbstractTypeRaisingRule, FragmentJoining, GlueRule, TypeChangingRule
public abstract class AbstractRule
extends Object
implements Rule, Serializable

Implements some default behavior for Rule objects.

Version:
$Revision: 1.18 $, $Date: 2009/12/21 03:27:18 $

Jason Baldridge, Michael White

arity

public abstract int arity()
The number of arguments this rule takes. For example, the arity of the forward application rule of categorial grammar (X/Y Y => Y) is 2.

Specified by:
arity in interface Rule
Returns:
the number of arguments this rule takes

applyRule

public abstract List<Category> applyRule(Category[] inputs)
                                  throws UnifyFailure
Apply this rule to some input categories.

Specified by:
applyRule in interface Rule
Parameters:
inputs - the input categories to try to combine
Returns:
the categories resulting from using this rule to combine the inputs
Throws:
UnifyFailure - if the inputs cannot be combined by this rule
